backend/main.mo: Defines enquiry and feedback types, stores them in maps, and exposes submit and query functions with ID auto-increment and timestamping.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record describing a background image addition on the Trusted Electrical Contractors page with related files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base overrides defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes plus global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and renders the app with SiteLayout and all page components.
frontend/src/components/ImageGalleryGrid: Responsive grid component that displays images with modal preview using Dialog components.
frontend/src/components/LegalRegistratio: Renders GSTIN, UDYAM, PF, and ESIC legal details with icons.
frontend/src/components/ProjectCard.tsx: Card component displaying a project's title, location, and description with map pin icon.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Card component showing a service icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with company info, quick links, contact details, legal details, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the main site layout with header, footer, and routed content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useFeedbackList.ts: Fetches all feedback entries using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitEnquiry.ts: Submits enquiries via the actor and invalidates enquiry-related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitFeedback.ts: Submits feedback via the actor and refreshes feedback queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables.
frontend/src/lib/formatters/time.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into readable date strings.
frontend/src/lib/validation/enquiryValid: Validates enquiry form fields including contact info and message length.
frontend/src/lib/validation/feedbackVali: Validates feedback form data such as rating, contact info, and message content.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClient, and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/EnquiryPage.tsx: Implements enquiry and feedback forms with validation, submission, and feedback listing.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a gallery of project images using a grid component.
frontend/src/pages/MajorClientsPage.tsx: Displays a list of major clients with a header, image, and grid of client cards.
frontend/src/pages/MajorProjectsPage.tsx: Renders detailed major project descriptions and an image gallery of ongoing project photos.
frontend/src/pages/QualitySafetyPolicyPa: Shows quality and safety policy sections with images and cards outlining commitments and standards.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists the company's electrical services using service cards and includes a header and featured image.
frontend/src/pages/TrustedElectricalCont: Provides the landing page with hero section, company overview, highlights, and calls to action.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, fonts, container settings, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for the BM Enterprises website.
